import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { RouterLink } from '@angular/router'; import { IonicModule } from '@ionic/angular'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'], standalone: true, imports: [IonicModule, RouterLink] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit() {} }
